import React from "react"; import {Link, NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import styles from "./Card.module.css" export default function Card({id, name, species, gender, status, origin, image, onClose}) {//Aplicamos destructuring de props return (//le pasamos al button la funcion Onclose pasada por props

{name}

Specie: {species}

Gender:{gender}

Current Status: {status}

Known Origin: {origin}

); }
